dt: {bc}a member of a nomadic central Asian people gaining control of a large part of central and eastern Europe under Attila about {sc}a.d.{/sc} 450

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}Hunas{/it}, plural, from Late Latin {it}Hunni{/it}, plural
shortdef: a member of a nomadic central Asian people gaining control of a large part of central and eastern Europe under Attila about a.d. 450
a person who is wantonly destructive : vandal
